title: Bloodmoon Skins Not Out With 7.3?
body: So I saw that the new Bloodmoon skins for Jhin, Diana, Talon and Twisted Fate were supposed to be released with patch 7.3 but i haven't seen them hit the store yet. Has Riot pushed back the skins for a much later patch?

replies.body: The BM skins will probably be released when the Hunt of the Blood Moon game mode is released, so before Friday evening
Welcome to League of Legends. Every single patch skins are released, they're released later in the patch.
